alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Effingham (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 3:01PM EDT until April 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Effingham County in southeastern Georgia... Chatham County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Godley Station, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Pooler, Godley Station, Savannah International Airport, Rincon, Garden City, Port Wentworth, Bloomingdale, Meinhard, and Monteith. This warning includes the following interstates: I-16 between mile markers 151 and 158. I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 101 and 112. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
